sysevent_in_email_action.description:
This inbound email action is triggered when an email is forwarded to this instance, to a mailbox starting with x_80311_security_i or with the subject starting with Security Incident and the email is not a reply or forward.
This inbound email action can create a new Security Incident Request, setting the opened by, caller, short description, description, contact type. The original email will be stored in the work notes.
In addition to being able to explicitly set the values of the above fields within the email, the following is done automatically:
1. The caller is set to the the user who sent the email. 2. The email subject is set as the short description. 3. The whole email is added to the work notes. 4. The contact type is set to "email".
Example: This email will create a new Security Incident Request for Fred Luddy
From: Fred Luddy <fred.luddy@example.com> Subject: FW: Security Incident:I need assistance Date: June 11, 2013 1:44:55 PM PDT To: ServiceNow
----- Original Email -------- Please provide me with a .....
-----
sysevent_in_email_action.name: Create Security Incident Request (Forwar
